outline:
1. conduit, water course, trench
  2. healing (of new flesh and skin forming over wound)
    1. (CLBL) bandage, plaister (for healing of wound)
kjv_def: conduit, cured, healing, little river, trench, watercourse.
strongs_def: a channel (into which water is raised for irrigation); also a bandage or plaster (as placed upon a wound)
